Create a Gatsby site Use the Gatsby CLI (install instructions) to create a new site, specifying the gatsby-clean-blog starter. if you are not using npx, following Gatsby Getting Started 2. Start developing Navigate into your new site's directory and start it up. 3. Open the source â€¦

Welcome to Gatsby Clean Blog Starter! 1. Support markdown with Five frontmatter title date subtitle category draft 2. Support emoji You can check Emoji Cheat Sheet for lists of emoji! 3. Support light/dark mode 4. Support pagination You can set sibling count (of the current page) and page size (numâ€¦
